column4: Uncategorized;Phnom Penh:------ At 5:30 pm on October 26
column7: 33-year-old Israeli man  was questioned after an Order of Arbitration to 291A was issued on October 25
column10: a deputy prosecutor of the Phnom Penh Municipal Court.------The court order was issued after a complaint of defamation via Facebook was made to police by a member of the public.------https://postnews.com.kh/local/382324------EDIT:------It seems the case involves leaking of a ‘video’ of a starlet called ‘Lumi’ (pictured). There was talk of violence etc
